citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 pm on 8-18-
21. Upon arrival at the facility, the licensee was contacted by phone. She indicated she was away from the facility and
would not be back for a couple of hours.
Additional Inspectors:
Paige Johnson, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 pm on 8-18-
21. Upon arrival at the facility, the licensee was contacted by phone.  She indicated she was away from the facility and 
would not be back for a couple of hours. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Paige Johnson, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section
